trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around March 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside in my back yard in Lititz to walk my dog and looked up when I saw an airplane flying over. It was an exceptionally clear night and the lights on the airplane were very sharp and crisp. Then I noticed this boomerang shaped craft flying east to west. It was blurry looking, not nearly as crisp as the light of the airplane flying far above it. It had a series of red lights at the front and made no sound.It moved very smoothly. I was not upset, just surprised. It passed over the horizon and I lost sight of it. I have no way of judging how big it was. Several months ago I saw something quite similar, but much higher in the sky. It was moving north to south and I assumed it was a reflection off of a satellite or the ISS. Now I believe it was the same type of craft.
Summary: Boomerang shaped ufo with red lights
